description: Need dinner in a hurry? This speedy BBQ style pork recipe will be on the table in 15 minutes. Tender pork is served with greens for a delicious crunch.
keywords: Pork dishes,Tree nut free,Egg free,Jun 2021,Sesame free,Broccolini,Quick & easy dinner,Microwave,Rice,Pork,Dairy free
name: BBQ pork, rice & greens bowls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 560g Woolworths COOK slow cooked Chinese BBQ style pork with char siu sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pork in microwave according to packet instructions, reserving sauce sachet. Cook broccolini and snow peas in a saucepan of boiling water until tender. Drain.
Heat rice according to packet instructions. Shred pork, then divide rice, pork and greens among bowls. Drizzle with reserved sauce and serve scattered with chilli and onion.
